lyrics.line: [Verse 1]
No, you don't have to go
You don't have to go
No, you don't have to go
Baby come on pull me close
You don't have to go
You don't have to go
You don't have to go
Baby, come on keep me close
I wanna love you
Loving every inch of your body
You make me do things
I can't explain, and all I know is
That I'm so in love, in love with you
With you, I'm so in love, in love with you
I'm so in love, I'm so in love
In love with you
I'm so in love with you
I can't get you out of my head
No, no, no, no
Baby, you've gotta let me know
How is it gal, you feel about me
Cos I've been in the booth
Tryna spit this shit like it's the truth
And you know, you know
My heart beats for you
You know that ill do anything for you
Even if ... it's
